project.name: C-C824A-FFMP-03-ST01-DT04-DF13-CF15-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C824A-FFMP-03-ST01-DT04-DF13-CF15-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Create a function pointer on the stack. If the input length is not equal to 10, set the function pointer to a function. Try to use the function pointer. This will seg fault if the input length is exactly 10.

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
